p: Protocol was as follows: plant material was dipped in 5 L of distilled water (Chinese star anise 200 g, Brazilian red pepper 400 g, cinnamon 300 g). The kinetic was calculated as the first drop of distillate was seen, and extraction was conducted until no more oil was extracted. The essential oil was dried over magnesium sulphate and stored at 4 Â°C until used.
